reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress beautiful and well-made, with a soft, form-fitting design that accentuates curves in the right places. The dress is comfortable, stretchy, and true to color, with one customer noting it's great for different weather conditions. They appreciate its versatility, with one mentioning it can be dressed up with a jacket if needed. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, comfortable, classy
items.body: This was not the right color. I should have ordered thd green so it's going back. ( video said it was teal one but it wasn't). I ordered xl. Was big at the waist. I'm 5'7" and 165 lbs. I'll be ordering the L in the right color. I have another dress that I bought at navy's very similar to this fabric and construction. Very Cindy. Had an almost full lining. Goes down to 2 inches above my ankle. The sleeves are not lined but the material's pattern doesn't really let your arms show thru much, if that makes sense. I can't wait to exchange this for the one I wanted. It's really nice and comfortable. No one would believe you only paid this price. Four thumbs up lol Read more
items.author: Vee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and Durable
items.body: Bought it for a funeral. So cute and appropriate. Quality was better than expected. It was comfortable enough to dress down w/ flats and a denim jacket to wear on plane and then dress up with heels after landing to head straight to the funeral. Fit true to size and is flattering to shape although not too revealing. Read more
items.author: TiffnLB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this flattering dress even after jet lag!
items.body: Wore this for family photos in Rome. Beautiful dress, soft fabric and perfect thickness. The length fit me perfectly at 5’0” and this was a 5/5 as far as beauty and comfort! I haven’t washed it yet but will run on delicates or hand wash. Read more
items.author: Chelsea Bond

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for semi-forma to possibly formal occasions.
items.body: 5'4, 139lbs. Fits beautifully, comfortable, looks more expensive than you would expect. Perfect for 50+ hiding any flaws, but showing nice shape. Well-lined. Not see through where it counts. Fabric is soft, very wrinkle resistant. Looks dressy vs casual, but has the comfort of a casual dress. Read more
items.author: Max Henderly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Maxi dress in style
items.body: The color of this dress is spot on from online view. Looks elegant for a great price. Size it true to fit. Read more
items.author: Dawn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wedding guest dress
items.body: This dress is wonderful!! One of my favorite Amazon finds ever. Great quality and very comfortable. The style is very flattering and the materiel is thick enough to hide any undergarment lines. I’m planning to order in other colors. I’m typically a size 6 or 8 in dresses. I ordered the medium and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find, will definitely be wearing again!
items.body: I’m 5’4” 155-160lbs, I ordered a Medium and it’s fit perfectly and was so flattering even without shapewear. I have a slightly larger bust (36 DD), and this dress made for a very elegant silhouette. The length hit right above my ankles so even for shorter/average girlies it won’t be too long. I was afraid when I pulled it out of the packaging that I was too short for it, but paired it with a modest sized heel and it all came together. You may need to steam it, depending on which material you choose, because mine was darker and I was in a dark lighting the wrinkles weren’t obvious. For the price this is so worth it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and elegant
items.body: I wore this dress for my husband’s celebration of life, and it was absolutely perfect. The style is elegant and flattering, and the floral mesh design added just the right touch of softness and grace. I received so many compliments throughout the day. The fit was true to size and comfortable to wear for several hours. It felt both respectful and beautiful — exactly what I hoped for on such a meaningful day. Highly recommend this dress for any special occasion. Read more
items.author: Monica W

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Blackred, Apricot, Black, Brownfloral, Blackfloral, Tealfloral, Plaidblack, Neon, Plum, Darkblue, Leopard, Brownblue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
